additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Methyl Salicylate 74.88 mg/Patch Camphor 46.80 mg/Patch Menthol 37.44 mg/Patch

additionalProperty.name: Contains
additionalProperty.value: Methyl Salicylate 74.88 mg/Patch Camphor 46.80 mg/Patch Menthol 37.44 mg/Patch 3 Medicated Pain Relieving Heat Patches (8cm x 13cm)

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Do not use: - if you are sensitive to any ingredients or peppermint oil - if pregnant, likely to become pregnant or breastfeeding - in children under 14 years - if allergic to aspirin or any other non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug as shown by asthma, itch skin or runny nose after taking it - for long periods without talking to your doctor - in conjunction with heat pads - on wounds, damaged or irritated skin - more than the stated dose. If you use too many patches or a child under 14 years applies one of the patches, talk to a doctor or hospital casualty department straight away.

description: Dencorub Self Adhesive Medicated Pain Relieving Heat Patches
name: Self Adhesive Medicated Pain Relieving Heat Patches
